commit_msg:
Input: gtco - fix potential out-of-bound access

parse_hid_report_descriptor() has a while (i < length) loop, which
only guarantees that there's at least 1 byte in the buffer, but the
loop body can read multiple bytes which causes out-of-bounds access.

Reported-by: Andrey Konovalov <andreyknvl@google.com>
Reviewed-by: Andrey Konovalov <andreyknvl@google.com>
Cc: stable@vger.kernel.org
Signed-off-by: Dmitry Torokhov <dmitry.torokhov@gmail.com>
Bug Filter Response:
**Final Output:**

Analysis: The patch addresses an out-of-bounds access issue in the parse_hid_report_descriptor function by adding a bounds check before accessing memory. This prevents potential unauthorized data access or execution, which is a security concern.

Final Classification: Security Vulnerability Fix

Confidence Score: 1.0
